title.rendered: Laval University Fall & Winter Application Requirement, Deadline 2024

content.rendered:
The Laval University Admission 2024, Laval Admission Requirement, Deadline & Acceptance Rate is given as follows;

Contents on This Page

Toggle
  • Summary of the Admission Requirement
  • Laval University Acceptance Rate
  • Laval Admission Requirement 2024
  • How to Apply for Admission into Laval University
  • Laval University Application Deadline 2024
      • Documents Required for Admission
  • Laval University Application Fees
  • How to Pay for Application:
  • Visa Process for International Students
  • Fees & Tuition for International Students
    • Tuition fees per credit
  • Student associations

Summary of the Admission Requirement

Application Portal:                                          Online portal

Application Fee (non-refundable):                  $94.50

Mode of Payment:                                          Visa/Master card

Academic Calendar:                                       Semester-based

Intake Seasons            :                                   Fall/Winter/Summer

Work Experience:                                           Required for Business Programs

Financial Aid:                                                 Scholarships

This is to inform all interested students and the entire public that the Laval University admission for 2024 academic sessions is open online for Undergraduate Programs. The Laval Admission is open for the Fall and Winter or Summer sessions.

Laval University Acceptance Rate

59%

Laval Admission Requirement 2024

Laval University accepts the following for admission consideration;

  • French speaking language. (Apply for French Proficiency Language Test here)
  • Diploma attesting to 13 years of school education equivalent to a Quebec Diploma of College Studies. For details on country-specific requirements
  • LORs, SOPs, language proficiency score as supporting documents

How to Apply for Admission into Laval University

  • Go to https://monportail.ulaval.ca/admission
  • Fill same and send to the Admission Application Email: reg@reg.ulaval.ca

Laval University Application Deadline 2024

Laval University application deadline 2024 for Undergraduate/Graduate Admissions is given as follows. All application should keep dates.

Fall:                 February 1

Winter:            September 15

Summer:          January 15

Documents Required for Admission

  • Birth certificate (legible copy)
  • Legible copy of transcript(s) of secondary, college-level, post-secondary, or pre-university studies
  • Detailed résumé including a description of your work/life experience
  • The Registrar’s Office may later request a copy of your diploma.
  • International Applicants
    • Upon arrival, international applicants must present their passports or study permits for the purpose of confirming their dates of birth.
    • Legible copy of official transcripts from your final 2 years of pre-university education
    • Legible copy of official results of grades received on secondary level baccalaureate exams
    • Legible copy of official transcripts from your university studies or additional studies undertaken after completing your pre-university education.
    • Legible copy of diplomas or degree certificates, once awarded, or official transcripts showing the name of the diploma received.
  • Front and back copies of your permanent resident card and Quebec Selection Certificate (CSQ), if applicable

Laval University Application Fees

The application Fees for admission into the 2024 academic year is $94.50

How to Pay for Application:

Paying for the admission application form is done online with the help of Visa/Master card

Visa Process for International Students

The following documents are required from all Internationally admitted students.

  • A valid passport
  • A Québec Acceptance Certificate (CAQ), from the Ministry of immigration for programs longer than 6 months
  • Apply for a study permit and visa
  • Quebec’s immigration law requires proof of valid health and hospitalization insurance.

Fees & Tuition for International Students
